import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Modal } from 'react-bootstrap-v5' import ReactApexChart from "react-apexcharts"; import { chartData } from './ChartData' export default function Swap() { const [chainModal, setChainModal] = useState(false); const [name, setname] = useState('Maximum Return'); const [walletModal, setWalletModal] = useState(false); const [MoreInfo, setMoreInfo] = useState(true); const [currency1, setCurrency1] = useState('BNB'); const [currency2, setCurrency2] = useState('w8Bit'); const [slippageaction, setSlippageaction] = useState(false) const [selectedSlippage, setSelectedSlippage] = useState('0.5%'); const [currency1Icon, setCurrency1Icon] = useState('bnb.png'); const [currency2Icon, setCurrency2Icon] = useState('8bitchain.png'); const [swap, setSwap] = useState('ProDex'); const [swapicon, setSwapIcon] = useState('pool_logo.png'); const [swapList, setSwapList] = useState(false); const series = [ { data: chartData, }, ]; const SwapCurrency = () => { const temp = currency1; setCurrency1(currency2); setCurrency2(temp); const iconTemp = currency1Icon; setCurrency1Icon(currency2Icon); setCurrency2Icon(iconTemp) } return (
